Index >  IfPaperDetectable

IfPaperDetectable

Description

Returns whether the Source has a paper sensor that can detect documents on the ADF or Flatbed. This is a read-only property.

Data type

bool

Default value

true

Syntax

.IfPaperDetectable;

Remarks

Set this property after OpenSource() and before AcquireImage().

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See also

IfAutoFeed
IfFeederEnabled
IfFeederLoaded
